dialogue: Oh... before you go...
Yes princess?
I just have to mention... a small scheduling issue.
I will need to be out of town every other week... ...to take care of my mother who's very sick.
Listen to me very carefully `cause I don't think you've heard me.
I WANT YOU for this show. So we'll organize around whatever mother, brother, fucking sick dog or rabbit you need to take care of.
Gorgeous and with a pure heart. People are gonna LOVE that!
I need you to come back.
To empty your office. Whenever you want, no rush. This afternoon? Great, See you then!
Aaaaahh, there's   she is!!! Where have you been??!   We wanted to all have a drink for   your departure - something big to   mark the occasion.
Anyway, I've gathered everything for you, to save time. And we all chipped in... ...we bought you just a little something to keep you busy...
You'll open it at home. It's French. My wife swears by it! Oops! I've got to run! But come and visit whenever you like! We'll always be happy to see you!
She moved out.
I'm the new tenant. Sue.
We've discovered your little secret.
I couldn't believe MY EARS!
Listen I-
You can't actually be living in ... ..ELISABETH SPARKLE'S APARTMENT??!
It's too much of a coincidence! I sack her and BAM! Here she is again trying to stick her foot right back in the door!
Uh...yes we...we briefly met when she was moving out of town... she asked me if I was looking for a place to rent... which I was so... there you have it.
Oh she left town?... where did she go?
Uh... ... Costa Rica I think.
But WHY?? I've j-
Ratings are through the roof.
We started at 42. We're now at...
That's phe-no-me-nal. We've never seen such figures in all the network's history! PEOPLE LOVE YOU!
That's why we've decided we want you to host... THE NEW YEAR'S EVE
...you mean... The...
...network's biggest show! 50 million viewers... LIVE. You can't get any higher ...
Well, except if you die... then you'd go...

Anyway, I'm taking a huge gamble on you and these men can tell you I talked you up to the shareholders `til my last drop of saliva, convincing them this is the way to go. It's going to be intense. We have only a few months to pull it off, but I know we can do it. So? What do you say?
Are you in?
If you don't open the door when opportunity knocks, you won't get another chance...
You of all people know this...
Just one more. Then I have a week off, and we can switch.
I've got some amazing news... We are doing the cover of Vogue!
It's just one more day, it's not a big deal...
I'm coming just a sec!
I'll meet you there!
Let me introduce you to the shareholders! They've been dying to meet you!
Everything ok?
OOOH... feathers feathers feathers...
